channel.title: Making it so when someone goes to log in it already has ip there
channel.description:
[img]http://i614.photobucket.com/albums/tt230/bmaw/kkk.jpg[/img]
Instead of having to type in the ip we want to make it so that when you click login the ip is already there.
Thanks, Bmaw

item.title: Making it so when someone goes to log in it already has ip there
item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

Replace
@whi@Server IP: "redemptionpk.no-ip.org
With
@whi@Server IP: redemptionpk.no-ip.org

Or, you could do it the correct way, replace it with
@whi@Server IP:

And search for server = “”; and add ur server ip in between the ""s.

Also, search for setserver("", 43594);

again, add your ip in between the “” 's

Hope I helped.

Think about it like this:
“This quote is gramatically correct.”
“You are trying to do this, which wouldn’t make "sense, really.”

Read full topic
